```{r}
library(readxl)

data <- read_excel('world-population.xlsm')
data
```



```{r}
library(scales)
ggplot(data = data, aes(y= data$Population /10^9, x = data$Year)) +
  geom_line()+
  labs(x = 'Year', y = 'World Population')+
   scale_y_continuous(labels = unit_format(unit = "Billion"))+
  ggtitle('World Population by Year')
```

```{r}
library(scales)
ggplot(data = data, aes(y= data$Population /10^9, x = data$Year)) +
  geom_step(color = 'blue')+
  labs(x = 'Year', y = 'World Population')+
   scale_y_continuous(labels = unit_format(unit = "Billion")) +
  ggtitle('World Population by Year')
```
